title: How to I turn on "voice privacy"? It currently does not allow me to turn it on.
content:
I am trying to turn on "voice privacy" in my call settings. I can see the toggle button to turn it on, but it does not allow me to select it. 

When I make calls, my phone is extremely loud and easy for people nearby to hear my conversation. I have also tried just lowering the call volume.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 5
